TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: I leave this message seeking help with a matter.
SOLANUM: A scroll I took from within the tower slipped from my grasp as I fell into the pool.
SOLANUM: I dove into the pool, hoping to retrieve it, but the long, electrifying tentacles of the pool's inhabitant fiercely guards the scroll at the bottom of the pool!
SOLANUM: I could find nowhere to read it, and so took it with me.. Now, not only have I lost a vital piece of our clan's history, I have polluted a habitat for the native species..
SOLANUM: I feel deeply ashamed leaving this scroll where it rest until I can return with help, but I have already received a few shocks trying to retrieve it..
SOLANUM: If anyone who finds this message is able to beseech the lifeform to budge, so that the scroll can be safely retrieved: I would be most grateful if you would kindly do so in my stead!
